about_the_game:
Cards of Binokee is a trading card game with the aim of collecting different cards to be able to assemble a powerful deck of cards. With this deck of cards, you can then compete against different opponents. With each completed game you collect orbs (in-game currency), which you can use to expand your card collection.

Play with your deck of cards against the computer in various game modes to train, gain
experience and expand your card collection through the orbs you earn.

Collect more than 1000 cards

Over 1000 different cards with different strengths can be collected throughout the game.
This also includes rare cards and cards with various elements.

Open chests to collect cards

With the orbs you earn, you can always buy new chests to expand your card collection.
There are different chests to choose from which ones each containing five new trading cards.
Depending on the selected chest can also stronger cards or rare cards may be included.
With the new cards, you can then keep improving your deck of cards.

One card can change everything

There are different, freely selectable/combinable game modes. Depending on the game
mode or selected game mode combination, it can therefore also happen that one single card
changes the entire duel.

name: Cards of Binokee

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon X1600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this turn-based trading card game, you can face off against different opponents with your deck of cards over and over again. With the orbs you earn, you can constantly expand your card collection and thus redesign and strengthen your deck.
